src_original: bhadanta rājñā mūrdhātena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritam,
141.001. <141>bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vipaśyī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho loke utpannaḥ/
141.003. atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bandhumatīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśāt/  141.004. tatrānyataraścautkariko nāma vaṇik/
141.004. bhagavantaṃ vipaśyinamasecanakadarśanarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā adhikaḥ prasāda utpannaḥ/  ekaḥ kaṇṭakamāhatya bhūmau patitaḥ/  141.007. tato vaṇik prasādajātaḥ praṇidhiṃ karoti--
tasmāccatvāro mudgāḥ pātre patitā avaśiṣṭā bhūmau patitāḥ,
